arabicText: ۞ فَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّن كَذَبَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلصِّدْقِ إِذْ جَآءَهُۥٓ ۚ أَلَيْسَ فِى جَهَنَّمَ مَثْوًۭى لِّلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
So	who	is	more	unjust	than	one	who	
fabricates	a	lie	against	Allah,	and	denies	
the	truth	when	it	comes	to	him?	Is	not	the	
destination	of	disbelievers	in	hell?
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	us	se	badh	kar	zālim	kaun	jo	Allāh	par	
jhoot	bāñdhe	aur	ḥaq	ko	jhutlāye	jab	us	ke	
pās	āaye	kyā	jahannam	meiñ	kāfiroñ	kā	
thikānā	nahiñ.

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِى جَآءَ بِٱلصِّدْقِ وَصَدَّقَ بِهِۦٓ ۙ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُتَّقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	those	who	brought	this	truth	and	
those	who	testify	for	it	–	these	are	the	
pious.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	woh	jo	yeh	sach	le	kar	tashrif	 lāye	aur	
woh	jinhoñ	ne	un	ki	tasdiq	ki	yahi	dar	wāle	
haiñ	.

arabicText: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
For	them	is	whatever	they	wish,	before	
their	Lord;	this	is	the	reward	of	the	
virtuous.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Un	ke	liye	hai	jo	woh	chāheñ	apne	Rab	ke	
pās	nekoñ	kā	yahi	sila	hai.

arabicText: لِيُكَفِّرَ ٱللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ أَسْوَأَ ٱلَّذِى عَمِلُوا۟ وَيَجْزِيَهُمْ أَجْرَهُم بِأَحْسَنِ ٱلَّذِى كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
So	that	Allah	may	relieve	them	of	their	
worst	deeds,	and	reward	them	for	the	best	
deeds	they	had	done.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Take	Allāh	un	se	utār	de	bure	se	burā	kām	
jo	unhoñ	ne	Kiyā		aur	unheñ	un	ke	sawāb	
kā	sila	de	achche	se	achche	kām	par	jo	woh	
karte	the.

arabicText: أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّهُ بِكَافٍ عَبْدَهُۥ ۖ وَيُخَوِّفُونَكَ بِٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦ ۚ وَمَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنْ هَادٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
Is	not	Allah	Sufficient	for	His	slave?	And	
they	threaten	you	with	others	beside	Him!	
And	whomever	Allah	sends	astray	–	there	
is	no	guide	for	him.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kyā	Allāh	apne	bandoñ	ko	kāfi	nahiñ	aur	
tumheiñ	darāte	haiñ	us	ke	siwā	auroñ	se	
aur	jise	Allāh	gumrah	kare	us	ki	koyi	
hidāyat	karne	wālā	nahiñ.

arabicText: وَمَن يَهْدِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن مُّضِلٍّ ۗ أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّهُ بِعَزِيزٍۢ ذِى ٱنتِقَامٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	no	one	can	mislead	whomever	Allah	
guides;	is	not	Allah	the	Most	Honourable,	
the	Avenger?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jise	Allāh	hidāyat	de	usey	koyi	
bahkāne	wālā	nahiñ	kyā		Allāh	‘izzat	wālā	
badla	lene	wālā	nahiñ?

arabicText: وَلَئِن سَأَلْتَهُم مَّنْ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُ ۚ قُلْ أَفَرَءَيْتُم مَّا تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ إِنْ أَرَادَنِىَ ٱللَّهُ بِضُرٍّ هَلْ هُنَّ كَـٰشِفَـٰتُ ضُرِّهِۦٓ أَوْ أَرَادَنِى بِرَحْمَةٍ هَلْ هُنَّ مُمْسِكَـٰتُ رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ قُلْ حَسْبِىَ ٱللَّهُ ۖ عَلَيْهِ يَتَوَكَّلُ ٱلْمُتَوَكِّلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	if	you	ask	them,	“Who	has	created	the	
heavens	and	the	earth?”,	they	will	surely	
say,	“Allah”;	say,	“What	is	your	opinion	
regarding	those	whom	you	worship	other	
than	Allah	–	if	Allah	wills	to	cause	me	some	hardship,	so	will	they	avert	the	hardship	sent	by	Him?	
Or	if	He	wills	to	have	mercy	upon	me,	so	will	they	restrain	His	mercy?”	Proclaim,	“Allah	is	
Sufficient	for	me;	the	people	who	trust	must	rely	only	upon	Him.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	tum	un	se	poocho	āasmān	aur	zamin	kis	ne	banāye?	To	zaroor	kaheñ	ge	Allāh	ne	tum	
farmāo	bhalā	batāo	to	woh	jinheñ	tum	Allāh	ke	siwā	poojte	ho	agar	Allāh	mujhe	koyi	taklif	
pahuñchānā	chāhe	to	Kyā		woh	us	ki	bheji	taklif	tāl	deñ	ge	yā	woh	mujh	par	mehar	(raḥam)	
farmānā	chāhe	to	Kyā		woh	us	ki	mehar	(Raḥam)	ko	rok	rakheñ	ge	tum	farmāo	Allāh	mujhe	bas	
hai	bharose	wāle	us	par	bharosa	kareñ.

arabicText: قُلْ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْمَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمْ إِنِّى عَـٰمِلٌۭ ۖ فَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Proclaim,	“O	my	people!	Keep	on	with	your	works	in	your	positions,	I	am	doing	mine;	so	you	will	
soon	come	to	know.”	-
romanUrduTranslationText: Tum	farmāo	aey	meri	qaum	apni	jagah	kām	kiye	jāo	meiñ	apnā	kām	kartā	hoñ	to	āage	jān	jāo	ge.

arabicText: مَن يَأْتِيهِ عَذَابٌۭ يُخْزِيهِ وَيَحِلُّ عَلَيْهِ عَذَابٌۭ مُّقِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
“To	whom	will	come	a	punishment	that	will	disgrace,	and	upon	whom	descends	the	punishment	
that	never	ends.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Kis	par	āatā	hai	woh	áƶāb	ke	usey	ruswā	kare	gā	aur	kis	par	utartā	hai	áƶāb	ke	rah	pade	gā.

arabicText: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ لِلنَّاسِ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ فَمَنِ ٱهْتَدَىٰ فَلِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ وَمَن ضَلَّ فَإِنَّمَا يَضِلُّ عَلَيْهَا ۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِوَكِيلٍ
englishTranslationText:
We	have	indeed	sent	down	this	Book	to	
you	with	the	truth,	in	order	to	guide	
mankind;	so	whoever	attains	guidance	has	
attained	it	is	for	his	own	good,	and	
whoever	strays,	has	strayed	for	his	own	
harm;	and	you	are	not	at	all	responsible	for	
them.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	Ham	ne	tum	par	yeh	Kitāb	logoñ	ki	
hidāyat	ko	ḥaq	ke	sāth	utāri	to	jis	ne	rāh	
pāyi	to	apne	bhale	ko	aur	jo	bahkā	woh	
apne	hi	bure	ko	bahkā	aur	tum	kuchh	un	ke	
ƶimmedār	nahiñ

arabicText: ٱللَّهُ يَتَوَفَّى ٱلْأَنفُسَ حِينَ مَوْتِهَا وَٱلَّتِى لَمْ تَمُتْ فِى مَنَامِهَا ۖ فَيُمْسِكُ ٱلَّتِى قَضَىٰ عَلَيْهَا ٱلْمَوْتَ وَيُرْسِلُ ٱلْأُخْرَىٰٓ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍۢ مُّسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍۢ لِّقَوْمٍۢ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
It	is	Allah	Who	gives	death*	to	living	beings	
at	the	time	of	their	demise,	and	to	those	
who	do	not	die,	during	their	sleep;	so	He	
restrains	the	soul	on	which	the	decree	of	
death	has	been	passed,	and	leaves	the	
other	till	the	appointed	term;	indeed	in	this	
are	signs	for	people	who	reflect.	(*Death	is	
of	2	types	–	passing	to	the	next	world,	and	
sleeping.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allāh	jānoñ	ko	wafāt	detā	hai	un	ki	maut	ke	
waqt	aur	jo	na	mareñ	unheñ	un	ke	sote	
meiñ	phir	jis	par	maut	kā	ḥukm	farmā	diyā	
usey	rok	rakhtā	hai	aur	dosri	aik	mi’āad	
muqarrar	tak	chord	detā	hai	be-shak	is	
meiñ	zaroor	nishāniyāñ	haiñ	soñchne	
wāloñ	ke	liye.

arabicText: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ شُفَعَآءَ ۚ قُلْ أَوَلَوْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ شَيْـًۭٔا وَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
What!	Have	they	chosen	intercessors	
against	Allah?	Proclaim,	“What!	Even	if	
they	do	not	own	anything	nor	have	any	
intelligence?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kyā	unhoñ	ne	Allāh	ke	muqābil	kuch	
sifārshi	banā	rakhe	haiñ	tum	farmāo	Kyā		
agarche	woh	kisi	cheez	ke	mālik	na	hoñ	aur	
na	áql	rakheñ.

arabicText: قُل لِّلَّهِ ٱلشَّفَـٰعَةُ جَمِيعًۭا ۖ لَّهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Proclaim,	“To	Allah	only	*	belongs	all	the	
intercession!	For	Him	only	is	the	kingship	
of	the	heavens	and	the	earth;	and	then	it	is	
towards	Him	that	you	have	to	return.”	
(*Allah	does	not	intercede	–	He	gives	the	
permission	to	intercede	with	Him,	to	
whomever	He	wills.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	shafā’at	to	sab	Allāh	ke	hāth	
meiñ	hai	usi	ke	liye	hai	āasmānoñ	aur	zamin	ki	bādshāhi	phir	tumheñ	usi	ki	ṭaraf	palatnā	hai.

arabicText: وَإِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ ٱشْمَأَزَّتْ قُلُوبُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۖ وَإِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ إِذَا هُمْ يَسْتَبْشِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	when	Allah	the	One	God	is	mentioned,	the	hearts	of	those	who	do	not	believe	in	the	Hereafter	
get	constricted;	and	when	others	(false	deities)	besides	Him	are	mentioned,	they	rejoice!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	aik	Allāh	kā	ƶikr	Kiyā		jātā	hai	dil	simat	jāte	haiñ	un	ke	jo	āakhirat	par	Imān	nahiñ	lāte	aur	
jab	us	ke	siwā	auroñ	ka	ƶikr	hotā	hai	jabhi	woh	khushiyāñ	manāte	haiñ

arabicText: قُلِ ٱللَّهُمَّ فَاطِرَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ عَـٰلِمَ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ أَنتَ تَحْكُمُ بَيْنَ عِبَادِكَ فِى مَا كَانُوا۟ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Invoke	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	–	peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him),	“O	Allah!	The	Creator	of	
the	heavens	and	the	earth,	the	All	Knowing	of	all	the	hidden	and	the	open,	You	will	judge	between	
Your	bondmen,	regarding	the	matters	in	which	they	differed.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	árz	karo	aey	Allāh	āasmānoñ	aur	zamin	ke	paidā	karne	wāle	nihāñ	(poshida)	aur	‘iyāñ		
(zāhir)	ke	jānne	wāle	tu	apne	bandoñ	meiñ	faisla	farmāye	gā	jis	meiñ	woh	ikhtilāf	rakhte	the.

arabicText: وَلَوْ أَنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ مَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًۭا وَمِثْلَهُۥ مَعَهُۥ لَٱفْتَدَوْا۟ بِهِۦ مِن سُوٓءِ ٱلْعَذَابِ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۚ وَبَدَا لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَمْ يَكُونُوا۟ يَحْتَسِبُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	if	the	unjust	owned	all	that	is	in	the	earth,	and	another	one	in	addition	to	it,	they	would	surely	
give	it	in	exchange	for	freedom	from	the	wretched	punishment	on	the	Day	of	Resurrection;	and	
a	matter	which	they	had	never	imagined,	appeared	to	them	from	their	Lord.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	zālimoñ	ke	liye	hotā	jo	kuchh	zameen	meiñ	hai	sab	aur	is	ke	sāth	us	jaisā	to	yeh	sab	
chudāyi	meiñ	dete	roz-e-qiyāmat	ke	bade	áƶāb	se	aur	unheñ	Allāh	ki	ṭaraf	se	woh	bāt	zāhir	huyi	
jo	un	ke	khayāl	meiñ	na	thi.

arabicText: وَبَدَا لَهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُوا۟ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	the	evils	they	earned	appeared	to	
them,	and	the	thing	they	used	to	mock	at	
descended	upon	them.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	un	par	apni	kamāyi	huyi	burāiyāñ	khul	
gayiñ	aur	un	par	āa	padā	woh	jis	ki	hansi	
banāte	the.

arabicText: فَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ ضُرٌّۭ دَعَانَا ثُمَّ إِذَا خَوَّلْنَـٰهُ نِعْمَةًۭ مِّنَّا قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أُوتِيتُهُۥ عَلَىٰ عِلْمٍۭ ۚ بَلْ هِىَ فِتْنَةٌۭ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
So	when	some	hardship	reaches	man,	he	
prays	to	Us;	then	later	when	We	bestow	a	
favour	upon	him,	he	says,	“I	obtained	this	
only	because	of	some	knowledge”;	in	fact	it	
is	a	test,	but	most	of	them	do	not	have	any	
knowledge.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	jab	āadmi	ko	koyi	taklif	pahuñchti	hai	
to	hameñ	bulātā	hai	phir	jab	usey	ham	
apne	pās	se	koyi	ne’amat	áṭā	famāyeñ	
kahtā	hai	yeh	to	mujhe	aik	‘ilm	ki	badaulat	
mili	hai	balke	woh	to	āazmāish	hai	magar	
un	meiñ	bahutoñ	ko	‘ilm	nahiñ.

arabicText: قَدْ قَالَهَا ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَمَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Those	before	them	also	said	the	same,	so	
their	earnings	did	not	benefit	them	at	all.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Un	se	agle	bhi	aise	hi	kah	chuke	to	un	kā	
kamāyā	un	ke	kuchh	kām	na	āayā.

arabicText: فَأَصَابَهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُوا۟ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ مِنْ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ سَيُصِيبُهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُوا۟ وَمَا هُم بِمُعْجِزِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Therefore	the	evils	of	their	earnings	befell	
them;	and	those	who	are	unjust	among	
them	-	soon	the	evils	of	the	earnings	will	
befall	them,	and	they	cannot	escape.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	un	par	pad	gayiñ	un	ki	kamāiyoñ	ki	
burāiyāñ	aur	woh	jo	un	meiñ	zālim	haiñ	
ánqarib	un	par	padeñ	gi	un	ki	kamāiyoñ	ki	
burāiyāñ	aur	woh	qābo	se	nahiñ	nikal	
sakte.
